meanings.definition: Lacking in good taste or refinement
meanings.sent1: The movie's tastelessness made it hard to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: Her tastelessness in fashion was evident from her mismatched outfit.
meanings.sent3: Despite his tastelessness in jokes, he always made people laugh.
meanings.sent4: The tastelessness of the painting left the art critics unimpressed.
meanings.sent5: The tastelessness of the dish was so overpowering that no one could eat it.

meanings.definition: The quality of being offensive or vulgar in appearance or behavior
meanings.sent1: The tastelessness of the remark offended many at the party.
meanings.sent2: The tastelessness of the graffiti on the wall was quickly removed.
meanings.sent3: The tastelessness of the prank was not appreciated by anyone.
meanings.sent4: The tastelessness of the show shocked the audience.
meanings.sent5: The tastelessness of his behavior was unacceptable in a professional setting.
